About Us

What is NMA?

Animation & Interface Design

The New Media Arts (NMA) program is a two year AS degree program located at Kapi‘olani Community College (KCC) in Honolulu, Hawaii. The NMA mission is to prepare students for employment in the fields of interface design and animation.

Meet the NMA Faculty Read About NMA Graduates

About KCC NMA

The New Media Arts (NMA) program is a two year AS degree program at Kapi‘olani Community College (KapCC) in Honolulu, Hawaii. Our mission is to prepare students for employment in the fields of interface design and animation.
